{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Planet |model=WAP-4000 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/21/2003 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Global Sun |manuf_model=GL2454AP-QA |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=O7J-GL2454AP-QA |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2313A |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV800BBTC-70 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L64164A-7T |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated |serial=yes,, 10-pin header,, unpopulated |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2313A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR2112A |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Kendin |eth_chip2_model=KS8721B |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=ThreadX;G4.0.4.0; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:30:4F |oui_eth=00:30:4F }} {{TagLine|54/108Mbps Super G Wireless LAN Access Point}}
[http://www.planet.com.ru/en/product/product_ov.php?id=4434 Product page]
This device is noted in the [[Global Sun GL2454AP-QA]]'s FCC test report.. and looks pretty much identical to the [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=509929 '''LevelOne''' WAP-0003 in this '''DD-WRT''' forum thread] (which has the GL2454AP-QA's FCC ID on its label). :There is no FCC ID on the WAP-4000's label.. but, per this, the FCC ID (and approval date) of the GL2454AP-QA has been assigned to this entry.
==Additional external links== [http://nag.ru/telecom-equipment/inside/6971/planet-wap4000.html Images on ''NAG'''s site] :"GL2454AP-QA0-"<...> and "VER:V1.0" is silkscreened on the board in this picture
==Images== ===via Wikimedia Commons=== [[File:Planet WAP-4000.JPG|500px]]
